string.ID: Ah, a stranger. Welcome to the hydropon. I am Thah.

strings.string: ▶Ah, a stranger. Welcome to the hydropon. I am Thah.

string.ID: Moon and Sun, Thah. I am =name=.

strings.string: ▶Moon and Sun, Thah. I am =name=.

string.ID: What manner of being are you?

strings.string: ▶What manner of being are you?

string.ID: Is all well here?

strings.string: ▶Is all well here?

string.ID: Live and drink, Thah.

strings.string: ▶Live and drink, Thah.

string.ID: Well met, =name=. Please forgive the, ah, austerity of our cradle. You may sup with us at our meager camp and rest under the shade of this Palladium shell. Sorry, as well, about the crowding.

strings.string: ▶Well met, =name=. Please forgive the, ah, austerity of our cradle. You may sup with us at our meager camp and rest under the shade of this Palladium shell. Sorry, as well, about the crowding.

string.ID: You don't seem to like your accommodations.

strings.string: ▶You don't seem to like your accommodations.

string.ID: We are called slynth, a people grown one by one from a hydroponic cradle containing a cutting of water lily and empowered by sunslag. We are but a handful of generations old, and kept no written history until I was grown, ah, some number of decades ago.

strings.string: ▶We are called slynth, a people grown one by one from a hydroponic cradle containing a cutting of water lily and empowered by sunslag. We are but a handful of generations old, and kept no written history until I was grown, ah, some number of decades ago.

string.ID:
Well enough. We drink the sun's rays, eat what we scavenge, rest under the shell, and it is. Enough.
I read and tinker. Some hunt. Others tend the cradle. Each day is like the next. Every so often, someone leaves.
We, ah, rarely hear from them thereafter. I hope they are all well.

strings.string:
▶Well enough. We drink the sun's rays, eat what we scavenge, rest under the shell, and it is. Enough.
I read and tinker. Some hunt. Others tend the cradle. Each day is like the next. Every so often, someone leaves.
We, ah, rarely hear from them thereafter. I hope they are all well.

string.ID: You don't seem happy with the status quo.

strings.string: ▶You don't seem happy with the status quo.

string.ID:
To be wholly honest, =name=, I grow frustrated.
We are a young species, grown one by one in yonder sun-touched cradle. Over years, we have increased, but not, ah, not. Not grown.
Look around you. You see it, yes? This hydropon is no settlement.

strings.string:
▶To be wholly honest, =name=, I grow frustrated.
We are a young species, grown one by one in yonder sun-touched cradle. Over years, we have increased, but not, ah, not. Not grown.
Look around you. You see it, yes? This hydropon is no settlement.

string.ID: How can I help?

strings.string: ▶How can I help?

string.ID:
This is an existential conundrum, =name=, I'm not sure that it could-- ah, wait, no. I am reconsidering.
No, you could help. If you wished. I think.
May I explain?

strings.string:
▶This is an existential conundrum, =name=, I'm not sure that it could-- ah, wait, no. I am reconsidering.
No, you could help. If you wished. I think.
May I explain?

string.ID: Please do.

strings.string: ▶Please do.

string.ID: I have changed my mind. Live and drink.

strings.string: ▶I have changed my mind. Live and drink.

string.ID: I don't believe my people wish to stay here, but we have had so little, ah, meaningful contact with other sapient creatures. We have no allies. We have nowhere to go but here.

strings.string: ▶I don't believe my people wish to stay here, but we have had so little, ah, meaningful contact with other sapient creatures. We have no allies. We have nowhere to go but here.

string.ID: You travel far and wide, do you not? You have the air of a traveling hero! From the epics. As such, you have seen many settlements, likely ingratiated yourself to some.

strings.string: ▶You travel far and wide, do you not? You have the air of a traveling hero! From the epics. As such, you have seen many settlements, likely ingratiated yourself to some.

string.ID: Surely, if you were to intercede on our behalf, some might welcome us? If, ah, let us say three settlements were to offer us shelter, this would grant us both direction and agency. Would you consider being our ambassador? Not unpaid.

strings.string: ▶Surely, if you were to intercede on our behalf, some might welcome us? If, ah, let us say three settlements were to offer us shelter, this would grant us both direction and agency. Would you consider being our ambassador? Not unpaid.

string.ID: I will help.

strings.string: ▶I will help.

string.ID: I decline. Live and drink.

strings.string: ▶I decline. Live and drink.

string.ID:
Thank you, =name=. I have, ah, I have been crafting a personal project. Of sorts. I promise it to you for this task, and of course the gratitude of a young species.
Return to me after settlements agree to grant us refuge, and I will discuss them with my kin.

strings.string:
▶Thank you, =name=. I have, ah, I have been crafting a personal project. Of sorts. I promise it to you for this task, and of course the gratitude of a young species.
Return to me after settlements agree to grant us refuge, and I will discuss them with my kin.

string.ID: Live and drink. I will return with news.

strings.string: ▶Live and drink. I will return with news.

string.ID: Come, =name=. It is time.

strings.string: ▶Come, =name=. It is time.

string.ID:
Ah, =name=, Moon and Sun.
Any news of our future home?

strings.string:
▶Ah, =name=, Moon and Sun.
Any news of our future home?

string.ID: Yes, I have news about the slynths' sanctuary.

strings.string: ▶Yes, I have news about the slynths' sanctuary.

string.ID: None yet. Live and drink, Thah.

strings.string: ▶None yet. Live and drink, Thah.

string.ID: Ah! Let us discuss?

strings.string: ▶Ah! Let us discuss?

string.ID:
Joppa! An historic site. I wasn't sure if, ah, it still existed. As a village.
The quiet of the saltmarshes may be strange to my people, but some have voiced a wish for more peace than the Reef can spare. Thank you for this choice, =name=.

strings.string:
▶Joppa! An historic site. I wasn't sure if, ah, it still existed. As a village.
The quiet of the saltmarshes may be strange to my people, but some have voiced a wish for more peace than the Reef can spare. Thank you for this choice, =name=.

string.ID:
The worshippers of Shekhinah? Fascinating. I, ah, don't know what to think of that.
It may be what my kin need, now I consider it. The Canticles make little sense to me but they are, ah, compelling. More compelling than me, certainly. I will discuss this with the others.

strings.string:
▶The worshippers of Shekhinah? Fascinating. I, ah, don't know what to think of that.
It may be what my kin need, now I consider it. The Canticles make little sense to me but they are, ah, compelling. More compelling than me, certainly. I will discuss this with the others.

string.ID:
Did you say Barathrumites? So that's how it's pronounced.
Grit Gate is, ah... that's where Q Girl resides, isn't it? She wrote my favorite book, {{W|Disquisition on the Malady of the Mimic}}. I imagine such a home would have a positive effect on my kin. I will speak to them.

strings.string:
▶Did you say Barathrumites? So that's how it's pronounced.
Grit Gate is, ah... that's where Q Girl resides, isn't it? She wrote my favorite book, {{W|Disquisition on the Malady of the Mimic}}. I imagine such a home would have a positive effect on my kin. I will speak to them.

string.ID:
Kyakukya? I didn't realize it had so many syllables.
That's where the, ah, faithful to the ape-god gather, correct? And, uh... Crowsong, as well. I will present this possibility to my people and we will discuss it.

strings.string:
▶Kyakukya? I didn't realize it had so many syllables.
That's where the, ah, faithful to the ape-god gather, correct? And, uh... Crowsong, as well. I will present this possibility to my people and we will discuss it.

string.ID:
Ezra is, ah, the village at the base of the Spindle, is it not?
The very cradle of history. Not that my kin have a strong taste for history, but perhaps living amongst fresco and bas-relief will change their, ah, collective outlook?

strings.string:
▶Ezra is, ah, the village at the base of the Spindle, is it not?
The very cradle of history. Not that my kin have a strong taste for history, but perhaps living amongst fresco and bas-relief will change their, ah, collective outlook?

string.ID: Fascinating. I know nothing about these mopango, but any people whose love for learning and discovery defines them are, ah... good, in my opinion. I will discuss this with my kin, and see if they agree.

strings.string: ▶Fascinating. I know nothing about these mopango, but any people whose love for learning and discovery defines them are, ah... good, in my opinion. I will discuss this with my kin, and see if they agree.

string.ID:
There is a sadness in, ah... choosing pariahs. Some of my kin dreamed of belonging, and the very word is the antithesis of belonging.
But then, if wanderers look after one another, there is a belonging in that as well. Even alone, we would not be alone. I will offer this choice to the others and we will discuss it.

strings.string:
▶There is a sadness in, ah... choosing pariahs. Some of my kin dreamed of belonging, and the very word is the antithesis of belonging.
But then, if wanderers look after one another, there is a belonging in that as well. Even alone, we would not be alone. I will offer this choice to the others and we will discuss it.

string.ID:
The nearby settlement? The one, ah, founded by three svardym and a galgal? I've always been mortally afraid to go there, knowing even the barest facts.
But you say they will accept us? Perhaps I was wrong.

strings.string:
▶The nearby settlement? The one, ah, founded by three svardym and a galgal? I've always been mortally afraid to go there, knowing even the barest facts.
But you say they will accept us? Perhaps I was wrong.

string.ID:
Bey Lah is real? Stain me surprised to hear so... I, ah, believed the hindren exclusively diasporic.
There is an undeniable poetry in it, if the slynth should emigrate to a mythical and secretive village. I will discuss this with my kin.

strings.string:
▶Bey Lah is real? Stain me surprised to hear so... I, ah, believed the hindren exclusively diasporic.
There is an undeniable poetry in it, if the slynth should emigrate to a mythical and secretive village. I will discuss this with my kin.

string.ID:
Chavvah? The, ah, the... the tree of life? Allows us joining?
That, that is simply, ah, extraordinary. I will apprise my kin of this, and we will, ah... we will ponder what it may mean for us.

strings.string:
▶Chavvah? The, ah, the... the tree of life? Allows us joining?

I read a history once that mentioned =village.name=, taking note of their reverence for =village.sacred= and equal loathing of =village.profane=.
Will my kin accept a life of =village.activity=? I will consult with them.

strings.string: ▶The village of =village.name= has agreed to accept the slynth as their own.

string.ID: Wanderer, thank you! I will tell my kin of these places. We will convene and discuss, and we will, ah, choose. Please be patient in the meantime.

strings.string: ▶Wanderer, thank you! I will tell my kin of these places. We will convene and discuss, and we will, ah, choose. Please be patient in the meantime.

string.ID: As you say, Thah. I will return.

strings.string: ▶As you say, Thah. I will return.

string.ID: Moon and Sun, =name=.

strings.string: ▶Moon and Sun, =name=.

string.ID: It's curious to see you still here, after helping your kin emigrate.

strings.string: ▶It's curious to see you still here, after helping your kin emigrate.

string.ID: Why have you asked me to return?

strings.string: ▶Why have you asked me to return?

string.ID: Moon and Sun, Thah.

strings.string: ▶Moon and Sun, Thah.

string.ID: I've been crafting a kind of a relic, a piece of art that serves a purpose and that you can carry on your, ah, your person. I finally finished building it while you were away, and the opportunities you offered us inspired the finishing touches. I'd like you to have it.

strings.string: ▶I've been crafting a kind of a relic, a piece of art that serves a purpose and that you can carry on your, ah, your person. I finally finished building it while you were away, and the opportunities you offered us inspired the finishing touches. I'd like you to have it.

string.ID: I will cherish it. Live and drink.

strings.string: ▶I will cherish it. Live and drink.

string.ID:
After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: Joppa shall be the new home of the slynth. The notion of a lasting, peaceful life with, ah, purpose... this appeals to many of our number, and where better than Abram's very watervine marsh?
Our emigration party departs for the saltmarshes in the morning.

strings.string:
▶After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: Joppa shall be the new home of the slynth. The notion of a lasting, peaceful life with, ah, purpose... this appeals to many of our number, and where better than Abram's very watervine marsh?
Our emigration party departs for the saltmarshes in the morning.

string.ID:
After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: most of our number will join the Mechanimist faith, and reside at the Stiltgrounds at the edge of the Mogh'ra'yi.
Our emigration party departs for the Six Day Stilt in the morning.

strings.string:
▶After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: most of our number will join the Mechanimist faith, and reside at the Stiltgrounds at the edge of the Mogh'ra'yi.
Our emigration party departs for the Six Day Stilt in the morning.

string.ID:
After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: The new home of the slynth is among the disciples of Barathrum. My kin have agreed to dedicate themselves to the pursuits of learning and service.
Our emigration party departs for Grit Gate in the morning.

strings.string:
▶After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: The new home of the slynth is among the disciples of Barathrum. My kin have agreed to dedicate themselves to the pursuits of learning and service.
Our emigration party departs for Grit Gate in the morning.

string.ID:
After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: Kyakukya shall be the new home of the slynth. There are many ways to grow when one is planted in the very heart of Qud.
Our emigration party departs for the river in the morning.

strings.string:
▶After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: Kyakukya shall be the new home of the slynth. There are many ways to grow when one is planted in the very heart of Qud.
Our emigration party departs for the river in the morning.

string.ID:
After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: The new home of the slynth is among the villagers of Ezra, harvesting musa alongside the banana ranchers and singing their songs.
Our emigration party departs for Omonporch in the morning.

strings.string:
▶After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: The new home of the slynth is among the villagers of Ezra, harvesting musa alongside the banana ranchers and singing their songs.
Our emigration party departs for Omonporch in the morning.

string.ID:
After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: the slynth shall become mopango, taking root in ancient rock and casting our gaze back toward the history that preceded us.
Our emigration party departs for the Tomb of the Eaters in the morning.

strings.string:
▶After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: the slynth shall become mopango, taking root in ancient rock and casting our gaze back toward the history that preceded us.
Our emigration party departs for the Tomb of the Eaters in the morning.

string.ID:
After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: The new home of the slynth is no home at all, but the floating fellowship of Qud's Pariahs. We were blessed with roots that need not fix themselves to the soil and have opted to use them accordingly.
We will split into parties and leave to meet with other wayfarers come morning.

strings.string:
▶After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: The new home of the slynth is no home at all, but the floating fellowship of Qud's Pariahs. We were blessed with roots that need not fix themselves to the soil and have opted to use them accordingly.
We will split into parties and leave to meet with other wayfarers come morning.

string.ID:
After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: the slynth shall join the Yd Freehold, remaining in the reef where our cradle lies but mingling among other sapient creatures to learn their ways and teach what we know.
Our emigration party departs for the Freehold in the morning.

strings.string:
▶After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: the slynth shall join the Yd Freehold, remaining in the reef where our cradle lies but mingling among other sapient creatures to learn their ways and teach what we know.
Our emigration party departs for the Freehold in the morning.

string.ID:
After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: Bey Lah shall be the new home of the slynth. There is a familiarity to this tucked-away village, newly greeting the world; this is our gentle emergence from obscurity, and one not undertaken alone.
Our emigration party departs for the flower fields in the morning.

strings.string:
▶After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: Bey Lah shall be the new home of the slynth. There is a familiarity to this tucked-away village, newly greeting the world; this is our gentle emergence from obscurity, and one not undertaken alone.
Our emigration party departs for the flower fields in the morning.

string.ID: After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: the slynth shall become a part of Chavvah, the living city. There are no words for the breadth of futures before us, and we would not know them if they were. Perhaps we will learn to chime.

strings.string: ▶After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: the slynth shall become a part of Chavvah, the living city. There are no words for the breadth of futures before us, and we would not know them if they were. Perhaps we will learn to chime.

After some discussion and deliberation, we have come to consensus: the slynth shall become citizens of =village.name=. We shall learn the practice of =village.activity=, hold =village.sacred= dear and spurn =village.profane=.
Our emigration party departs for =village.name= in the morning.

strings.string: ▶May you find knowledge.

strings.string: ▶May Oboroqoru be merciful.

strings.string: ▶May the Eaters protect you.

string.ID:
Ah, one last little thing, =name=. About your reward... it's not quite finished, but now I know just what it needs.
Please return to the hydropon after my kin have safely reached their new home and I will give it to you. I will not leave the cradle.

strings.string:
▶Ah, one last little thing, =name=. About your reward... it's not quite finished, but now I know just what it needs.
Please return to the hydropon after my kin have safely reached their new home and I will give it to you. I will not leave the cradle.

string.ID: I will. Live and drink.

strings.string: ▶I will. Live and drink.

string.ID:
Yes, I've decided to stay. It's not that, ah, it's not that I wouldn't enjoy a life of farming. But the thought of leaving the cradle after decades of watching it... I couldn't.
The hydropon is even less a village now, but you're welcome to rest here whenever you like.

strings.string:

The hydropon is even less a village now, but you're welcome to rest here whenever you like.

string.ID:
Yes, I've stayed. I don't, ah, resent that my kin have found succor in the embrace of faith, but I don't know how to walk that path myself. Someone needs to watch over the hydropon, besides.
The hydropon is even less a village now, but you're welcome to rest here whenever you like.

strings.string:

string.ID:
Yes, I've stayed. I'd love to see the vaunted halls and, ah, bathe in the light of brilliant minds, but when I think about the journey my roots lock up. I feel, ah, unready. Someone must watch over the cradle, besides.
The hydropon is even less a village now, but you're welcome to rest here whenever you like.

string.ID:
Yes, I've stayed. As fascinated as I would be to examine the statuary and bas-reliefs, my favorite mode of, ah, interaction with history is through the written word. Someone must watch over the cradle, besides.
The hydropon is even less a village now, but you're welcome to rest here whenever you like.

strings.string:

string.ID:
Yes, I've decided to stay. The Tomb sounds, ah, cozy, but I cannot fathom making such a macabre place my home. Someone must look over the cradle, besides.
The hydropon is even less a village now, but you're welcome to rest here whenever you like.

strings.string:
▶Yes, I've decided to stay. The Tomb sounds, ah, cozy, but I cannot fathom making such a macabre place my home. Someone must look over the cradle, besides.
The hydropon is even less a village now, but you're welcome to rest here whenever you like.

string.ID:
Yes, I've stayed. If I am entirely honest, the idea of a life on the road sounds, ah... unpleasant. To me, personally. I have grown accustomed to a life of collection, curation, and study that I don't care to abandon for adventure. Someone must stay to watch over the cradle, besides.
The hydropon is even less a village now, but you're welcome to rest here whenever you like.

strings.string:
▶Yes, I've stayed. If I am entirely honest, the idea of a life on the road sounds, ah... unpleasant. To me, personally. I have grown accustomed to a life of collection, curation, and study that I don't care to abandon for adventure. Someone must stay to watch over the cradle, besides.
The hydropon is even less a village now, but you're welcome to rest here whenever you like.

string.ID:
Yes, I've decided to stay. I don't disbelieve that the Yd Freehold is as safe as you say, but the fears instilled in me when I first learned to read as a fresh sprout haunt me even now. Perhaps in time I will visit, but in the meantime I can look after the cradle, as someone ought to do.
The hydropon is even less a village now, but you're welcome to rest here whenever you like.

strings.string:

string.ID:
Yes, I've decided to stay. The flower fields sound beautiful, and no doubt there is much to learn from the hindren. But the thought of leaving the cradle after decades of watching it... I couldn't.
The hydropon is even less a village now, but you're welcome to rest here whenever you like.

strings.string:
▶Yes, I've decided to stay. The flower fields sound beautiful, and no doubt there is much to learn from the hindren. But the thought of leaving the cradle after decades of watching it... I couldn't.
The hydropon is even less a village now, but you're welcome to rest here whenever you like.

string.ID:
Yes, I, ah, I remain.
I badly wish to taste of Chavvah's secrets, but the wonder I feel for such an entity is eclipsed only by the terror of such an experience. I cling to an excuse that the hydropon must be watched and wait. Perhaps someday I will shed that excuse's film and step free.
The hydropon is even less a village now, but you're welcome to rest here whenever you like.

string.ID: Is that so? I imagine you are wondering whether =village.name= will host these slynth, to partake in =village.activity= alongside us.

strings.string: ▶Is that so? I imagine you are wondering whether =village.name= will host these slynth, to partake in =village.activity= alongside us.

string.ID: You have done much for =village.name=, =name=, and your request befits your stature. If these slynth will join us in =village.activity= and if they can come to cherish =village.sacred= as we do, then they are welcome here.

strings.string: ▶You have done much for =village.name=, =name=, and your request befits your stature. If these slynth will join us in =village.activity= and if they can come to cherish =village.sacred= as we do, then they are welcome here.

string.ID: We have not come so far from the founding of =village.name= to allow these strangers in. What if they worship =village.profane=? No, we simply cannot do such a great favor for you.

string.ID: Ah, =name=, the slynth are here, and it is a slow process for these plant-folk and the people of =village.name= to grow accustomed to one another. By the goodness of =village.sacred= may the slynth find their place here soon.

strings.string: ▶Ah, =name=, the slynth are here, and it is a slow process for these plant-folk and the people of =village.name= to grow accustomed to one another. By the goodness of =village.sacred= may the slynth find their place here soon.

strings.string: ▶My thanks, =subject.t=.

string.ID: Praise =village.sacred=, the slynth learn our ways and we theirs. Some do not wholly accept the depravity of =village.profane=, but their ways are born of kindness, and so =village.name= will be kind in kind.

strings.string: ▶Praise =village.sacred=, the slynth learn our ways and we theirs. Some do not wholly accept the depravity of =village.profane=, but their ways are born of kindness, and so =village.name= will be kind in kind.

string.ID: My thanks again, =subject.t=.

strings.string: ▶My thanks again, =subject.t=.

string.ID: We share the bright and now, traveler =name=.

strings.string: ▶We share the bright and now, traveler =name=.

string.ID: What is this place?

strings.string: ▶What is this place?

string.ID: Who are you?

strings.string: ▶Who are you?

string.ID: The entity I spoke with at Eyn Roj mentioned a chiming rock...

strings.string: ▶The entity I spoke with at Eyn Roj mentioned a chiming rock...

string.ID: Explain once more what I must do with Tau's chime.

strings.string: ▶Explain once more what I must do with Tau's chime.

string.ID: I've reunited Tau with her chime.

strings.string: ▶I've reunited Tau with her chime.

string.ID: I've destroyed the chime, Dyvvrach.

strings.string: ▶I've destroyed the chime, Dyvvrach.

string.ID: I have completed the ritual of -elseing. Will you power Barathrum's starclimb, as you said?

strings.string: ▶I have completed the ritual of -elseing. Will you power Barathrum's starclimb, as you said?

string.ID: I come in the name of need. Barathrum asks the strength of your psyche to power our starclimb.

strings.string: ▶I come in the name of need. Barathrum asks the strength of your psyche to power our starclimb.

string.ID: This keter roams above my trunk at Eyn Roj, traveler =name=, and across the Stair I dream. You found me, this keter where I chime in dozens.

strings.string: ▶This keter roams above my trunk at Eyn Roj, traveler =name=, and across the Stair I dream. You found me, this keter where I chime in dozens.

string.ID: Ah, I am in need, and so I turned my chimes trunkward to tune. You struck the chime and now you are here. Are you a waterhand, and free?

strings.string: ▶Ah, I am in need, and so I turned my chimes trunkward to tune. You struck the chime and now you are here. Are you a waterhand, and free?

string.ID: What do you need?

strings.string: ▶What do you need?

string.ID:
My chimeling Tau leaves Chavvah, leaves me. It is her choice.
Her transit-psyche manifests at the bottom of Taproot, where we cannot consciously go. To finish the ritual of -elseing, to let Tau become -else, I need a traveler such as you, =name=.

strings.string:
▶My chimeling Tau leaves Chavvah, leaves me. It is her choice.
Her transit-psyche manifests at the bottom of Taproot, where we cannot consciously go. To finish the ritual of -elseing, to let Tau become -else, I need a traveler such as you, =name=.

string.ID: What must I do?

strings.string: ▶What must I do?

string.ID: Who is Tau?

strings.string: ▶Who is Tau?

string.ID:
Take Tau's chime, silent and still. Carry it to the bottom of Taproot, deep under my trunk, where she will make the chime her transit-body and walk away forever. Finish the ritual of -elseing.
At the bottom of Taproot, Tau manifests. She tells us, too, that another waits for her there.

strings.string:
▶Take Tau's chime, silent and still. Carry it to the bottom of Taproot, deep under my trunk, where she will make the chime her transit-body and walk away forever. Finish the ritual of -elseing.
At the bottom of Taproot, Tau manifests. She tells us, too, that another waits for her there.

string.ID: I will do as you ask.

strings.string: ▶I will do as you ask.

string.ID: I have more to ask, first.

strings.string: ▶I have more to ask, first.

string.ID:
Take Tau's chime, silent and still. Carry it to the bottom of Taproot, deep under my trunk, where she will make the chime her transit-body and walk away forever. Finish the ritual of -elseing.
At the bottom of Taproot, Tau manifests. She tells us, too, that another waits for her there.

strings.string:
▶Take Tau's chime, silent and still. Carry it to the bottom of Taproot, deep under my trunk, where she will make the chime her transit-body and walk away forever. Finish the ritual of -elseing.
At the bottom of Taproot, Tau manifests. She tells us, too, that another waits for her there.

string.ID:
So you have, and what proceeds, proceeds.
I felt your coming here, =name=, in Gyredream. I've felt this moment. I feel it now.
The ritual of -elseing is complete, waterhand. You are done, and with our thanks.

strings.string:
▶So you have, and what proceeds, proceeds.
I felt your coming here, =name=, in Gyredream. I've felt this moment. I feel it now.
The ritual of -elseing is complete, waterhand. You are done, and with our thanks.

string.ID: Thank you, traveler =name=.

strings.string: ▶Thank you, traveler =name=.

string.ID: My chimeling, burning bright, all starlight and right angles in her heart. She leaves Chavvah; it is her choice. I..

strings.string: ▶My chimeling, burning bright, all starlight and right angles in her heart. She leaves Chavvah; it is her choice. I..

string.ID: What must I do?

strings.string: ▶What must I do?

string.ID:
A sophist of the Self spilled ink and called me, long ago, the Tree of Life. To me, I am the many Selves pinched up my taproot from the permeating Soft.
I am Chavvah, and I am dyvvrach.

strings.string:
▶A sophist of the Self spilled ink and called me, long ago, the Tree of Life. To me, I am the many Selves pinched up my taproot from the permeating Soft.
I am Chavvah, and I am dyvvrach.

string.ID: Many selves? What does this mean?

strings.string: ▶Many selves? What does this mean?

string.ID: As Chavvah I am many. As dyvvrach I am one. I am one and many. One-selves have called me tree city, the sentient place. You may think of the Selves this way, sprouted in keter from Twofirm.

strings.string: ▶As Chavvah I am many. As dyvvrach I am one. I am one and many. One-selves have called me tree city, the sentient place. You may think of the Selves this way, sprouted in keter from Twofirm.
▶Twofirm?

string.ID: Deep under earth and permeating our roots is Soft, our feeling substance. Ground pressure pushes it up the taproot to our trunk, where it condenses into Twofirm: the biformal phase that contains the two sefirots, -then and -else.

strings.string: ▶Deep under earth and permeating our roots is Soft, our feeling substance. Ground pressure pushes it up the taproot to our trunk, where it condenses into Twofirm: the biformal phase that contains the two sefirots, -then and -else.

string.ID: *continue listening*

strings.string: ▶*continue listening*

string.ID: This is the genesis my distinct Self, an awareness that contains both -then, what I will become, and -else, what I will not. Twofirm flows up my sapwood to the keter, where -then manifests as an entity and I chime: I speak and hear the world.

strings.string: ▶This is the genesis my distinct Self, an awareness that contains both -then, what I will become, and -else, what I will not. Twofirm flows up my sapwood to the keter, where -then manifests as an entity and I chime: I speak and hear the world.

string.ID: {{emote|*Dyvvrach chimes*}}

strings.string: ▶{{emote|*Dyvvrach chimes*}}

string.ID:
You have completed the ritual of -elseing. You have set bright Tau free.
Yes, =name=. I will turn my chimes Spindleward to tune, then vibrate at our verve frequency. I will power your starclimb.
Be vested to tell whoever you must that Chavvah has made this commitment.

strings.string:
▶You have completed the ritual of -elseing. You have set bright Tau free.
Yes, =name=. I will turn my chimes Spindleward to tune, then vibrate at our verve frequency. I will power your starclimb.
Be vested to tell whoever you must that Chavvah has made this commitment.

string.ID: Thank you, Dyvvrach. Live and drink.

strings.string: ▶Thank you, Dyvvrach. Live and drink.

string.ID: I start at this but Tikva settles me. I remember now: from a cub I've known Barathrum to be weak in telling but bold in asking. A starclimb? You mean, an ascent to the long chiming rock?

strings.string: ▶I start at this but Tikva settles me. I remember now: from a cub I've known Barathrum to be weak in telling but bold in asking. A starclimb? You mean, an ascent to the long chiming rock?

string.ID: Barathrum intends to ascend the Spindle to discover the source of the Signal, yes. He needs a power source for the climber, one shielded from electromagnetic disturbance.

strings.string: ▶Barathrum intends to ascend the Spindle to discover the source of the Signal, yes. He needs a power source for the climber, one shielded from electromagnetic disturbance.

string.ID: oh. This. Was this felt in gyredream? Your coming to keter? I ask, do not answer.

strings.string: ▶oh. This. Was this felt in gyredream? Your coming to keter? I ask, do not answer.

string.ID: What is gyredream?

strings.string: ▶What is gyredream?

string.ID:
A future shock. My chimeling _ is vision-gifted, a lichen who clings to shorerock on the straits of Tomorrow. Just a short time ago a sea wave crested and broke beneath her, and she saw in its recession all the bright and violent channel paths.
We all felt it. A recoming, and the gyre in final tension. I felt...

strings.string:
▶A future shock. My chimeling _ is vision-gifted, a lichen who clings to shorerock on the straits of Tomorrow. Just a short time ago a sea wave crested and broke beneath her, and she saw in its recession all the bright and violent channel paths.
We all felt it. A recoming, and the gyre in final tension. I felt...

string.ID: *continue listening*

strings.string: ▶*continue listening*

string.ID: It was too much for my chimeling Tau. She gasped for air and her chime stilled. She leaves us now, to become -else. It is her choice.

strings.string: ▶It was too much for my chimeling Tau. She gasped for air and her chime stilled. She leaves us now, to become -else. It is her choice.

string.ID: I am sorry. But will you help Barathrum do as he asks?

strings.string: ▶I am sorry. But will you help Barathrum do as he asks?

string.ID: I am sorry. But will you help Barathrum do as he asks?

strings.string: ▶I am sorry. But will you help Barathrum do as he asks?

string.ID: {{emote|*Dyvvrach chimes*}}

strings.string: ▶{{emote|*Dyvvrach chimes*}}

string.ID: I will power his starclimb. If you take Tau's chime to taproot, for her to walk away. If you finish the ritual of -elseing.

strings.string: ▶I will power his starclimb. If you take Tau's chime to taproot, for her to walk away. If you finish the ritual of -elseing.

string.ID: The ritual of -elseing?

strings.string: ▶The ritual of -elseing?

string.ID: I see.

strings.string: ▶I see.

string.ID: {{emote|*Dyvvrach chimes*}}

strings.string: ▶{{emote|*Dyvvrach chimes*}}

string.ID: Again I must be calmed, but the startling gives way to a curiosity. You speak of the glowfolk, belimbed and free. You asking that they join us, like our Sant?

strings.string: ▶Again I must be calmed, but the startling gives way to a curiosity. You speak of the glowfolk, belimbed and free. You asking that they join us, like our Sant?

string.ID: We find no precedent for this, yet is there space upon our crystal arms and an openness within us. It is agreed: if these slynth will be of us, we will have them here.

strings.string: ▶We find no precedent for this, yet is there space upon our crystal arms and an openness within us. It is agreed: if these slynth will be of us, we will have them here.

string.ID: You all have my thanks.

strings.string: ▶You all have my thanks.

string.ID: I startle, and the roiling is felt before the calm. I cannot find a consensus for the housing of these beings, =name=. I am sorry.

strings.string: ▶I startle, and the roiling is felt before the calm. I cannot find a consensus for the housing of these beings, =name=. I am sorry.

string.ID: We await the decision of the glowfolk. Our imaginations run with the possibilities.

strings.string: ▶We await the decision of the glowfolk. Our imaginations run with the possibilities.

string.ID:
How this keter rustles! The slynth are among us and we adapt, our impressions a melange of excitement, apprehension, and wonder.
Though I have no single sentiment to express, we nonetheless approach -then with our new companions.

strings.string:
▶How this keter rustles! The slynth are among us and we adapt, our impressions a melange of excitement, apprehension, and wonder.
Though I have no single sentiment to express, we nonetheless approach -then with our new companions.

string.ID: My thanks, dyvvrach.

strings.string: ▶My thanks, dyvvrach.

string.ID: You are well-found, =name=. Though several have chosen their -else, the first of the slynth have joined to us like our Sant, mobile and apart but shared and together. This is a strange -then, but what branches may spill forth from it? I anticipate the witnessing.

strings.string: ▶You are well-found, =name=. Though several have chosen their -else, the first of the slynth have joined to us like our Sant, mobile and apart but shared and together. This is a strange -then, but what branches may spill forth from it? I anticipate the witnessing.

string.ID: Live and drink together, Chavvah.

strings.string: ▶Live and drink together, Chavvah.

string.ID: Strange creatures can be so cruel and arbitrary, I say in greeting.

strings.string: ▶Strange creatures can be so cruel and arbitrary, I say in greeting.

string.ID: Tau has departed.

strings.string: ▶Tau has departed.

string.ID: I see you.

strings.string: ▶I see you.

string.ID: Tau has departed.

strings.string: ▶Tau has departed.

string.ID:
I do not know how to remember beloved Tau, struggling like a minnow in Soft. In a place between death and living.
Leave me, please.

strings.string:
▶I do not know how to remember beloved Tau, struggling like a minnow in Soft. In a place between death and living.
Leave me, please.

string.ID: No parting is simple. I see you, -elser.

strings.string: ▶No parting is simple. I see you, -elser.

string.ID: Tau has completed the -elseing ritual.

strings.string: ▶Tau has completed the -elseing ritual.

string.ID:
And the sole tether she reached for severed. I mourn for the future she built for herself, now, and worry for Tau herself.
Thank you, all the same, for taking part in this. May you find your comfort.

strings.string:
▶And the sole tether she reached for severed. I mourn for the future she built for herself, now, and worry for Tau herself.
Thank you, all the same, for taking part in this. May you find your comfort.

string.ID: You are welcome. I yet have questions.

strings.string: ▶You are welcome. I yet have questions.

string.ID: No parting is simple. I see you, fair -elser.

strings.string: ▶No parting is simple. I see you, fair -elser.

string.ID: Tau has completed the -elseing ritual.

strings.string: ▶Tau has completed the -elseing ritual.

string.ID: You are welcome. I yet have questions.

strings.string: ▶You are welcome. I yet have questions.

string.ID: Oh? A traveler? I see you, then. Live... and drink.

strings.string: ▶Oh? A traveler? I see you, then. Live... and drink.

string.ID: I am =name=. Who are you?

strings.string: ▶I am =name=. Who are you?

string.ID: Your chime is cracked and ribboned on inside with starless clouds. Why?

strings.string: ▶Your chime is cracked and ribboned on inside with starless clouds. Why?

string.ID: Were you affected by gyredream?

strings.string: ▶Were you affected by gyredream?

string.ID: I am to carry Tau's chime to Taproot, so she can leave Chavvah.

strings.string: ▶I am to carry Tau's chime to Taproot, so she can leave Chavvah.

string.ID: Oh? Please, then, friend, ask.

strings.string: ▶Oh? Please, then, friend, ask.

string.ID:
{{emote|*Miryam chimes in deep tones.*}}
I am Miryam, friend.

strings.string:
▶{{emote|*Miryam chimes in deep tones.*}}
I am Miryam, friend.

string.ID:
{{emote|*Miryam chimes in long tones.*}}
It's the kriah, traveler. I am in mourning, and I chime in low tones.

strings.string:
▶{{emote|*Miryam chimes in long tones.*}}
It's the kriah, traveler. I am in mourning, and I chime in low tones.

string.ID: I am sorry, Miryam. Did you lose someone close to you?

strings.string: ▶I am sorry, Miryam. Did you lose someone close to you?

string.ID:
{{emote|*Miryam chimes in deep tones.*}}
I swim in cool and dark waters, traveler. For me, it is Shiva, the lament of seven thousand years.
I mourn the passing of all life, and all the necessity of death life must bring. For you, traveler, to come here, how many had to die? I mourn them.
Or are you the rarest one, who walks below the bright arches and claims no such cost? Even then, what losses did {{M|you}} suffer to come, traveler? What selves of yours had you to shed? Those are -else to us, and I mourn them as well.

strings.string:
▶{{emote|*Miryam chimes in deep tones.*}}
I swim in cool and dark waters, traveler. For me, it is Shiva, the lament of seven thousand years.
I mourn the passing of all life, and all the necessity of death life must bring. For you, traveler, to come here, how many had to die? I mourn them.
Or are you the rarest one, who walks below the bright arches and claims no such cost? Even then, what losses did {{M|you}} suffer to come, traveler? What selves of yours had you to shed? Those are -else to us, and I mourn them as well.

string.ID: *continue listening*

strings.string: ▶*continue listening*

string.ID:
{{emote|*Miryam chimes in aching tones.*}}
...but, too, someone close. Tau. Bright tau. She is gone.

strings.string:
▶{{emote|*Miryam chimes in aching tones.*}}
...but, too, someone close. Tau. Bright tau. She is gone.

string.ID: *continue listening*

strings.string: ▶*continue listening*

string.ID: {{emote|*Miryam chimes in aching tones.*}}

strings.string: ▶{{emote|*Miryam chimes in aching tones.*}}

string.ID:
{{emote|*Miryam chimes in melodic tones.*}}
Oh? You would finish the -elseing act?
I am your debtor, =name=. The ritual is how we organize the anguished practice of being. Now my grieving can begin.
Bright Tau shines always, here or there.

strings.string:
▶{{emote|*Miryam chimes in melodic tones.*}}
Oh? You would finish the -elseing act?
I am your debtor, =name=. The ritual is how we organize the anguished practice of being. Now my grieving can begin.
Bright Tau shines always, here or there.

string.ID: {{emote|*The chiming rock burns in soft light.*}}

strings.string: ▶{{emote|*The chiming rock burns in soft light.*}}

string.ID: ...what are you?

strings.string: ▶...what are you?

string.ID: [Touch the chiming rock and attune to Chavvah.]

strings.string: ▶[Touch the chiming rock and attune to Chavvah.]

string.ID:
{{emote|*The chiming rock rings a sonorous tone.*}}
Touch the chiming rock and seek me at the keter. Will you?

strings.string:
▶{{emote|*The chiming rock rings a sonorous tone.*}}
Touch the chiming rock and seek me at the keter. Will you?

string.ID: What does that mean?

strings.string: ▶What does that mean?

string.ID: {{emote|*The chiming rock is silent and still.*}}

strings.string: ▶{{emote|*The chiming rock is silent and still.*}}

string.ID: {{emote|*You are already attuned.*}}

strings.string: ▶{{emote|*You are already attuned.*}}

string.ID:
{{emote|*The chime rings a bone-shaking alarm.*}}
Is this a taunt? A challenge? What cruelty drives you to attempt communication after what you have done?

strings.string:
▶{{emote|*The chime rings a bone-shaking alarm.*}}
Is this a taunt? A challenge? What cruelty drives you to attempt communication after what you have done?

string.ID: How do you feel about Tau's departure?

strings.string: ▶How do you feel about Tau's departure?

string.ID: Your mockery disgusts me. You disgust me. I will not be calmed, Tikva!

strings.string: ▶Your mockery disgusts me. You disgust me. I will not be calmed, Tikva!

string.ID:
{{emote|*The chime rings a knell.*}}
O gesticulating hand.

strings.string:
▶{{emote|*The chime rings a knell.*}}
O gesticulating hand.

string.ID: How do you feel about Tau's departure?

strings.string: ▶How do you feel about Tau's departure?

string.ID:
We are adrift now. I will seek signs of her, or whatever she becomes. What do you care?
Do not answer.

strings.string:
▶We are adrift now. I will seek signs of her, or whatever she becomes. What do you care?
Do not answer.

string.ID:
{{emote|The chime rings loud and sharp.}}
Heavy the hand. Heavy the head.

strings.string:
▶{{emote|The chime rings loud and sharp.}}
Heavy the hand. Heavy the head.

string.ID: Tau has completed her -elseing.

strings.string: ▶Tau has completed her -elseing.

string.ID:
I wonder how it must feel to be =name=, so loath to see the pen of fate in another's grasp that you see fit to wrench it away. Does it bring exultation of control, or relief from a gnawing insecurity?
Do not answer. I will not be calmed. Ask if asking.

strings.string:
▶I wonder how it must feel to be =name=, so loath to see the pen of fate in another's grasp that you see fit to wrench it away. Does it bring exultation of control, or relief from a gnawing insecurity?
Do not answer. I will not be calmed. Ask if asking.

string.ID: I do have questions, still.

strings.string: ▶I do have questions, still.

string.ID:
You. I roil to see you. I welcome you. I churn.
Do you know this weight, I wonder? Can you?

strings.string:
▶You. I roil to see you. I welcome you. I churn.
Do you know this weight, I wonder? Can you?

string.ID: Tau has completed the -elseing ritual.

strings.string: ▶Tau has completed the -elseing ritual.

string.ID:
I am torn asunder! This outcome, this outcome, the shear splits me. Why Ptoh? How? Has this always been us? Which of us yet carry this -else to reify under pressure to our extancy?
Do not answer. There is no word-answer, and perhaps none at all. You have done us a service and I thank you for this -elseing.

strings.string:
▶I am torn asunder! This outcome, this outcome, the shear splits me. Why Ptoh? How? Has this always been us? Which of us yet carry this -else to reify under pressure to our extancy?
Do not answer. There is no word-answer, and perhaps none at all. You have done us a service and I thank you for this -elseing.

string.ID: You are welcome. I yet have questions.

strings.string: ▶You are welcome. I yet have questions.

string.ID:
{{emote|*the chime rings a sharp, urgent gonging tone*}}
Entity! You are given persistent will and agency, twice-hewn architecture of body and strong fiber that pulls. You bolt upright and damp-haired into fullness, your grasp abrading the threads of existence. Your responsibility remains whether acknowledged or not. Have strength, the time is now.

strings.string:
▶{{emote|*the chime rings a sharp, urgent gonging tone*}}
Entity! You are given persistent will and agency, twice-hewn architecture of body and strong fiber that pulls. You bolt upright and damp-haired into fullness, your grasp abrading the threads of existence. Your responsibility remains whether acknowledged or not. Have strength, the time is now.
▶Sorry?

string.ID: I am =name=. Who are you?

strings.string: ▶I am =name=. Who are you?

string.ID: I am =name=. Who are you?

strings.string: ▶I am =name=. Who are you?

string.ID: Is something the matter?

strings.string: ▶Is something the matter?

string.ID: Is all this about gyredream?

strings.string: ▶Is all this about gyredream?

string.ID: I am to carry Tau's chime to Taproot, so she can leave Chavvah.

strings.string: ▶I am to carry Tau's chime to Taproot, so she can leave Chavvah.

string.ID: I accept. Ask if asking.

strings.string: ▶I accept. Ask if asking.

string.ID:
{{emote|*the chime rings again, echoing louder in the walls of your mind*}}
Hear me! It is more important than ever to know that you are a driver, reforged and honed. You tool yourself to apply selective atrocity. It cannot be helped. You shape this, your path bloody and blooming. You start in sleep and shake the ground.
All must, but you most of all. The weight may have been negligent once, but it is terribly heavy now.
Do you accept responsibilty?

strings.string:
▶{{emote|*the chime rings again, echoing louder in the walls of your mind*}}
Hear me! It is more important than ever to know that you are a driver, reforged and honed. You tool yourself to apply selective atrocity. It cannot be helped. You shape this, your path bloody and blooming. You start in sleep and shake the ground.
All must, but you most of all. The weight may have been negligent once, but it is terribly heavy now.
Do you accept responsibilty?

string.ID: I do.

strings.string: ▶I do.

string.ID: I do not.

strings.string: ▶I do not.
▶What?

string.ID:
Yet, what you break is broken. -else is not -then regardless of will. This way split me again from Tikva, sundered early the love I knew, the denial. Our cowardice.
Ignore this digression. Ask, if asking.

strings.string:
▶Yet, what you break is broken. -else is not -then regardless of will. This way split me again from Tikva, sundered early the love I knew, the denial. Our cowardice.
Ignore this digression. Ask, if asking.

string.ID: You loved another chime?

strings.string: ▶You loved another chime?

string.ID:
You are encysted as Tikva, just as they! Milky white keratinous thoughts melt to a sick mass, wrapped in a protective membrane. I tremble. So it is.
Ask, if asking.

strings.string:
▶You are encysted as Tikva, just as they! Milky white keratinous thoughts melt to a sick mass, wrapped in a protective membrane. I tremble. So it is.
Ask, if asking.

string.ID: That's disgusting.

strings.string: ▶That's disgusting.

string.ID: What's that about Tikva?

strings.string: ▶What's that about Tikva?

string.ID: Just as Tikva, you turn away from your self-disgust. Yet, it is you and within you. You contain that you cannot tolerate.

strings.string: ▶Just as Tikva, you turn away from your self-disgust. Yet, it is you and within you. You contain that you cannot tolerate.

string.ID:
{{emote|*Tzedech emits a powerful, body-thrumming chime*}}
Yes. You understand destroying. You know the weight. We are past time of querulous inquisition, of confessions on lined parchment. Was the whole of this in your weight? It no longer matters. Scale the firmament, smite or soothe what rouses there.

strings.string:
▶{{emote|*Tzedech emits a powerful, body-thrumming chime*}}
Yes. You understand destroying. You know the weight. We are past time of querulous inquisition, of confessions on lined parchment. Was the whole of this in your weight? It no longer matters. Scale the firmament, smite or soothe what rouses there.

string.ID:
{{emote|*the chime rings clear and loud*}}
This called Tzedech. Compass, judgment, motivation. Once lover of Tikva, apart now after gyredream.

strings.string:
▶{{emote|*the chime rings clear and loud*}}
This called Tzedech. Compass, judgment, motivation. Once lover of Tikva, apart now after gyredream.

string.ID: You were another chime's lover?

strings.string: ▶You were another chime's lover?

string.ID: {{emote|*Tzedech chimes, buzzing with agitation*}}

strings.string: ▶{{emote|*Tzedech chimes, buzzing with agitation*}}

string.ID: Twofirm roils in me with the enormity. Can it contain so much gone and unremunerated? Tau, Tikva, and more to come. Consumed, we, and paralyzed.

strings.string: ▶Twofirm roils in me with the enormity. Can it contain so much gone and unremunerated? Tau, Tikva, and more to come. Consumed, we, and paralyzed.

string.ID:
It consumes me. I witnessed so little from the weave of outcomes. If I could remember them all, could I influence the course? Would I know what safe means? Too many questions with no conceivable answer. Was your rekindling the spark that caught fire? I do not know.
We are adrift.

strings.string:
▶It consumes me. I witnessed so little from the weave of outcomes. If I could remember them all, could I influence the course? Would I know what safe means? Too many questions with no conceivable answer. Was your rekindling the spark that caught fire? I do not know.
We are adrift.

string.ID:
Tau. We ache in her empty space. Who awaits at taproot? What fate is this?
This is the path. Be wary.

strings.string:
▶Tau. We ache in her empty space. Who awaits at taproot? What fate is this?
This is the path. Be wary.

string.ID:
Tikva. Once lover, now foil, perhaps lover again.
Its light invites and overwhelms, a hope blind and blinding. Cruel frustration at storm-time. When its eyes are needed they turn away. I will not be calmed. I will not be calmed!

strings.string:
▶Tikva. Once lover, now foil, perhaps lover again.
Its light invites and overwhelms, a hope blind and blinding. Cruel frustration at storm-time. When its eyes are needed they turn away. I will not be calmed. I will not be calmed!

string.ID: How can chimes in a tree be lovers?

strings.string: ▶How can chimes in a tree be lovers?

string.ID: You'll be together again?

strings.string: ▶You'll be together again?

string.ID: I should go. Live and drink.

strings.string: ▶I should go. Live and drink.

string.ID:
You are terribly small. Your love, small. Confined.
I cannot will not uplift your little concept. Do it yourself.

strings.string:
▶You are terribly small. Your love, small. Confined.
I cannot will not uplift your little concept. Do it yourself.

string.ID:
As seasons cycle, so Chavvah cycles. We are not as you, our love is not as you. But it is come early, this winter. Gyredream shakes us.
This is insufficient and I cannot bridge understanding. Consider questions of greater utility.

strings.string:
▶As seasons cycle, so Chavvah cycles. We are not as you, our love is not as you. But it is come early, this winter. Gyredream shakes us.
This is insufficient and I cannot bridge understanding. Consider questions of greater utility.

string.ID:
{{emote|*the sound of the chime rings querulous and faint, its light flickering.*}}
Please… no…

strings.string:
▶{{emote|*the sound of the chime rings querulous and faint, its light flickering.*}}
Please… no…

string.ID: Tau has departed.

strings.string: ▶Tau has departed.

string.ID: It ignores the monster. It ignores it. It ignores it.

strings.string: ▶It ignores the monster. It ignores it. It ignores it.

string.ID:
{{emote|*the sound of the chime rings querulous.*}}
The light shines upon you but illuminates nothing. It quails.

strings.string:
▶{{emote|*the sound of the chime rings querulous.*}}
The light shines upon you but illuminates nothing. It quails.

string.ID: Tau has departed.

strings.string: ▶Tau has departed.

string.ID: It stares into the light and wishes away the monster.

strings.string: ▶It stares into the light and wishes away the monster.

string.ID: Relief, relief. Relief from the void, safety from its creases.

strings.string: ▶Relief, relief. Relief from the void, safety from its creases.

string.ID: How do you feel about Tau's departure?

strings.string: ▶How do you feel about Tau's departure?

string.ID:
The light shines so bright, the voidshadow folds not upon it. It exults. It relaxes. It wills this troubled feeling away.
Thank you for clearing Tau's path, =name=. This is better.

strings.string:
▶The light shines so bright, the voidshadow folds not upon it. It exults. It relaxes. It wills this troubled feeling away.
Thank you for clearing Tau's path, =name=. This is better.

string.ID: You are welcome. I yet have questions.

strings.string: ▶You are welcome. I yet have questions.

string.ID: It is happy, it lies. It swells to witness Tau's choice, in pantomime of shared joy.

strings.string: ▶It is happy, it lies. It swells to witness Tau's choice, in pantomime of shared joy.

string.ID: How do you feel about Tau's departure?

strings.string: ▶How do you feel about Tau's departure?

string.ID:
It wills this troubled feeling away. It looks to the light with something in its eyes. It tries to blink the something away, but it cannot. The light is dim through the something in its eyes.
But the light yet shines. It will blink and it will see the light in searing glory. I thank you, I thank you, I thank you.

strings.string:
▶It wills this troubled feeling away. It looks to the light with something in its eyes. It tries to blink the something away, but it cannot. The light is dim through the something in its eyes.
But the light yet shines. It will blink and it will see the light in searing glory. I thank you, I thank you, I thank you.

string.ID: You are welcome. I yet have questions.

strings.string: ▶You are welcome. I yet have questions.

string.ID:
{{emote|*the chime rings a long, clarion tone.*}}
You are as beautiful as imagined. You ring with a shining purpose. This chime is awed to bask in your presence.

strings.string:
▶{{emote|*the chime rings a long, clarion tone.*}}
You are as beautiful as imagined. You ring with a shining purpose. This chime is awed to bask in your presence.

string.ID: I am =name=. Who are you?

strings.string: ▶I am =name=. Who are you?

string.ID: Your chime shines with such painful light.

strings.string: ▶Your chime shines with such painful light.

string.ID: Were you affected by gyredream?

strings.string: ▶Were you affected by gyredream?

string.ID: I am to carry Tau's chime to Taproot, so she can leave Chavvah.

strings.string: ▶I am to carry Tau's chime to Taproot, so she can leave Chavvah.

string.ID: Yes. It looks into the light with you.

strings.string: ▶Yes. It looks into the light with you.

string.ID:
{{emote|*the chime rings again*}}
It is called Tikva, low and humble. The chime rests in a web of strong love, a little piece of something greater and so much more beautiful. As are you, but a gestalt unto yourself. A world to be orbited.

strings.string:
▶{{emote|*the chime rings again*}}
It is called Tikva, low and humble. The chime rests in a web of strong love, a little piece of something greater and so much more beautiful. As are you, but a gestalt unto yourself. A world to be orbited.

string.ID: It channels the breathtaking things seen and heard and known. Bathe your senses in it until they grow accustomed. You will see nothing else.

strings.string: ▶It channels the breathtaking things seen and heard and known. Bathe your senses in it until they grow accustomed. You will see nothing else.

string.ID:
{{emote|*the chime rings, a querulous and tinny sound*}}
It... can scarce find the dream in this light. It thinks of Tzedech and weeps. It was not here, last time the static was in high pitch, but it remembers the pain and fear. It is not ready to feel these, it cannot. Gaze into its light and speak not of nightmares.

strings.string:
▶{{emote|*the chime rings, a querulous and tinny sound*}}
It... can scarce find the dream in this light. It thinks of Tzedech and weeps. It was not here, last time the static was in high pitch, but it remembers the pain and fear. It is not ready to feel these, it cannot. Gaze into its light and speak not of nightmares.

strings.string: ▶'Your' Tzedech?

strings.string: ▶{{emote|*A long chime rings. The bed of a shallow creek teems with brief life.*}}

string.ID: Tau has met her fate.

strings.string: ▶Tau has met her fate.

string.ID: {{emote|*You tumble from the jar, your sinewy body twisting against the electric emptiness in your belly, the weight of eggs. You discover a morsel and consume it soft and delicious. You will spawn here. You will eat the morsels. Your babies will eat all of the morsels.}}

strings.string: ▶{{emote|*You tumble from the jar, your sinewy body twisting against the electric emptiness in your belly, the weight of eggs. You discover a morsel and consume it soft and delicious. You will spawn here. You will eat the morsels. Your babies will eat all of the morsels.}}

strings.string: ▶{{emote|*A long chime rings. The bed of a shallow creek teems with life and death, nature's self-consuming ouroboros.*}}

Helpless to myriad unknowable fates, the toad disappears from view into the rapids, sent there by your hand.*}}

It is as if cresting a great hill atop a cathedra or an oncoming witchwood overdose; the void yawns under you. Something terrible is born.*}}

string.ID:
The t-two sephirots. -then and -else. I cannot be -else. *I* cannot, of course. But -then? It does not seem so.
Their chimes ring at the right frequencies, others. But not so, mine.

strings.string:
▶The t-two sephirots. -then and -else. I cannot be -else. *I* cannot, of course. But -then? It does not seem so.
Their chimes ring at the right frequencies, others. But not so, mine.
▶Twofirm?

string.ID:
{{emote|*Tammuz quivers and chimes a jarring tone.*}}
O-Oh. Oh u-uh oh oh. By contrasts, a q-quake stills even the most anxious trembling...
The world... the world becomes and unbecomes. All the nervous, volcanic energy of being. Who becomes who? Three became one, but what of them now?
And w-what becomes of Tau? Of me? Of y-you?

strings.string:
▶{{emote|*Tammuz quivers and chimes a jarring tone.*}}
O-Oh. Oh u-uh oh oh. By contrasts, a q-quake stills even the most anxious trembling...
The world... the world becomes and unbecomes. All the nervous, volcanic energy of being. Who becomes who? Three became one, but what of them now?
And w-what becomes of Tau? Of me? Of y-you?

string.ID: {{emote|*The chime is silent and still.*}}

strings.string: ▶{{emote|*The chime is silent and still.*}}

string.ID:
You have severed the hand outstretched to me. Why?
What have you done? What am I to do?

strings.string:
▶You have severed the hand outstretched to me. Why?
What have you done? What am I to do?

string.ID: Your will would have been suborned to Ptoh.

strings.string: ▶Your will would have been suborned to Ptoh.

string.ID: That's not my problem.

strings.string: ▶That's not my problem.

string.ID: I am sorry.

strings.string: ▶I am sorry.

string.ID: You will be happier this way.

strings.string: ▶You will be happier this way.

string.ID: How are you feeling?

strings.string: ▶How are you feeling?

string.ID: It seems that someone is waiting for you.

strings.string: ▶It seems that someone is waiting for you.

string.ID: You would suborn your will to Ptoh?

strings.string: ▶You would suborn your will to Ptoh?

string.ID:
{{M|You}} suborn my will! You allow me to start upon this path and block it. Yes?
Now I am truly adrift.

strings.string:
▶{{M|You}} suborn my will! You allow me to start upon this path and block it. Yes?
Now I am truly adrift.

string.ID:
Ah.
Well. You have my thanks for your help in -elseing, but by blocking my path you create fresh problems. Yes?
I do not wish to know you.
Live and drink.

strings.string:
▶Ah.
Well. You have my thanks for your help in -elseing, but by blocking my path you create fresh problems. Yes?
I do not wish to know you.
Live and drink.

string.ID:
I resent what has befallen me, but I am yet embodied. You have still helped me live, yes?
I forgive you, but I don't wish to know you. Live and drink.

strings.string:
▶I resent what has befallen me, but I am yet embodied. You have still helped me live, yes?
I forgive you, but I don't wish to know you. Live and drink.

string.ID:
Perhaps. My future is hazy. My future twists in the chill wind of the Gyre. I can have no faith in your vision. You understand this, yes?
I do not wish to know you.
Live and drink.

strings.string:
▶Perhaps. My future is hazy. My future twists in the chill wind of the Gyre. I can have no faith in your vision. You understand this, yes?
I do not wish to know you.
Live and drink.

string.ID: Present. Alone, afraid, but anticipating my return to the embrace of a collective.

strings.string: ▶Present. Alone, afraid, but anticipating my return to the embrace of a collective.

string.ID:
More than someone. My liaison is the extended, outstretched hands of a greater mind-haven than I have otherwise known. I might not have had the courage to -else without knowing that a collective awaited me.
My future is hazy, my future is bright.

strings.string:
▶More than someone. My liaison is the extended, outstretched hands of a greater mind-haven than I have otherwise known. I might not have had the courage to -else without knowing that a collective awaited me.
My future is hazy, my future is bright.

string.ID:
Speaking creatures seem very engrossed in this 'will' idea, but few agree what it is. Your mind is under influence from other thinkbeings the moment you observe them, yes? You 'learn' by imitating, your values and beliefs are adopted from observation. Yes?
I have made a choice to offer my consciousness to a new paradigm, but this choice seems distinct from your conception of 'will'. We speak past one another.

strings.string:
▶Speaking creatures seem very engrossed in this 'will' idea, but few agree what it is. Your mind is under influence from other thinkbeings the moment you observe them, yes? You 'learn' by imitating, your values and beliefs are adopted from observation. Yes?
I have made a choice to offer my consciousness to a new paradigm, but this choice seems distinct from your conception of 'will'. We speak past one another.

string.ID: The Seekers of the Sightless Way hunt espers.

strings.string: ▶The Seekers of the Sightless Way hunt espers.

string.ID: May the Fates favor you, Tau-no-Longer.

strings.string: ▶May the Fates favor you, Tau-no-Longer.

string.ID: May the Fates favor you, Tau-no-Longer.

strings.string: ▶May the Fates favor you, Tau-no-Longer.

string.ID: I leave you to your fate, then.

strings.string: ▶I leave you to your fate, then.

string.ID: I leave you to your fate, then.

strings.string: ▶I leave you to your fate, then.

string.ID:
Oh, yes? I see. Well.
Do you... not hunt? Or align with hunters? You reek of predation yourself. You kill, yes?
I recall no promise to become a grazing hedonist. If I am called to hunt I will hunt.

strings.string:
▶Oh, yes? I see. Well.
Do you... not hunt? Or align with hunters? You reek of predation yourself. You kill, yes?
I recall no promise to become a grazing hedonist. If I am called to hunt I will hunt.

string.ID: I wish the same for you, =name=. Live and drink.

strings.string: ▶I wish the same for you, =name=. Live and drink.

string.ID:
I wish the same for you, =name=.
Before you go, take this, a piece of my bodystuff, as thanks for completing the -elseing.
Then live and drink.

strings.string:
▶I wish the same for you, =name=.
Before you go, take this, a piece of my bodystuff, as thanks for completing the -elseing.
Then live and drink.

string.ID: As I you to yours, =name=. Live and drink.

strings.string: ▶As I you to yours, =name=. Live and drink.

string.ID:
As I you to yours, =name=.
But before you go, take this, a piece of my bodystuff, as thanks for completing the -elseing.
Then live and drink.

strings.string:
▶As I you to yours, =name=.
But before you go, take this, a piece of my bodystuff, as thanks for completing the -elseing.
Then live and drink.

string.ID:
Before you go, take this, a piece of my bodystuff, as thanks for completing the -elseing.
Then live and drink, =name=.

strings.string:
▶Before you go, take this, a piece of my bodystuff, as thanks for completing the -elseing.
Then live and drink, =name=.

string.ID:
The echoes of ending reverberate from the roots I once called mine.
My liaison is severed. Why?

strings.string:
▶The echoes of ending reverberate from the roots I once called mine.
My liaison is severed. Why?

string.ID: How are you feeling?

strings.string: ▶How are you feeling?

string.ID: Your will would have been suborned to Ptoh.

strings.string: ▶Your will would have been suborned to Ptoh.

string.ID: You are free to do as you please.

strings.string: ▶You are free to do as you please.

string.ID: I am sorry.

strings.string: ▶I am sorry.

string.ID: You will be happier this way.

strings.string: ▶You will be happier this way.

string.ID: Live and drink, Wandering Tau.

strings.string: ▶Live and drink, Wandering Tau.

string.ID: Live and drink, Wandering Tau.

strings.string: ▶Live and drink, Wandering Tau.

string.ID: I should be wary of you, yes? You have helped me to my -else, but I find my chosen path blocked.

strings.string: ▶I should be wary of you, yes? You have helped me to my -else, but I find my chosen path blocked.

string.ID:
It is not Ptoh that has suborned my will in this case.
I had chosen a path.

strings.string:
▶It is not Ptoh that has suborned my will in this case.
I had chosen a path.

string.ID:
And yet, I find my choices undermined, yes? You have my thanks for your help in -elseing, but do not convince yourself that you have 'freed' me from my own choices.
Live and drink.

strings.string:
▶And yet, I find my choices undermined, yes? You have my thanks for your help in -elseing, but do not convince yourself that you have 'freed' me from my own choices.
Live and drink.

string.ID:
I resent what has befallen me, but I am yet embodied. You have still helped me live.
My future is free. My future is murky, and I am freshly tender from the burn of your hand. I feel I had rather not encounter you for a time. Live and drink, =player.formalAddressTerm=.

strings.string:
▶I resent what has befallen me, but I am yet embodied. You have still helped me live.
My future is free. My future is murky, and I am freshly tender from the burn of your hand. I feel I had rather not encounter you for a time. Live and drink, =player.formalAddressTerm=.

string.ID:
Will I?
Your prediction warms little against the chill wind of the Gyre. My future is free. My future is murky. I am freshly tender from the burn of your hand.
I feel I had rather not encounter you for a time. Live and drink, =player.formalAddressTerm=.

strings.string:
▶Will I?
Your prediction warms little against the chill wind of the Gyre. My future is free. My future is murky. I am freshly tender from the burn of your hand.
I feel I had rather not encounter you for a time. Live and drink, =player.formalAddressTerm=.

string.ID: Before you go, rootclimber. I've shed a piece of me in the -elseing. Take it. I have no use for it now.

strings.string: ▶Before you go, rootclimber. I've shed a piece of me in the -elseing. Take it. I have no use for it now.

string.ID: Live and drink, Wandering Tau.

strings.string: ▶Live and drink, Wandering Tau.

string.ID: Begone from me, stardimmer. Your own hand has vaporized your purpose.

strings.string: ▶Begone from me, stardimmer. Your own hand has vaporized your purpose.

string.ID:
You thrived at the performance of a pruning motion, utensil. Now store yourself until Fate reshapes you.
The end.

strings.string:
▶You thrived at the performance of a pruning motion, utensil. Now store yourself until Fate reshapes you.
The end.

string.ID: The utensil arrives. You, to prune the fate-rhizome and free our girl. Go now and perform the motion.

strings.string: ▶The utensil arrives. You, to prune the fate-rhizome and free our girl. Go now and perform the motion.

string.ID: You're a seeker of the Sightless Way?

strings.string: ▶You're a seeker of the Sightless Way?

string.ID: Where are you taking Tau?

strings.string: ▶Where are you taking Tau?

string.ID: Give her your parting words, utensil. Our hearts are in elsewhere.

strings.string: ▶Give her your parting words, utensil. Our hearts are in elsewhere.

string.ID: Begone. Fate has not yet shaped you, utensil.

strings.string: ▶Begone. Fate has not yet shaped you, utensil.

string.ID: Utensil? That is my avocation, yes. A million sun-dead homes I've roved, a trillion more await. I'm a worm in the loam of a cosmic wood, perched on a cosmic gulf, swathed in the god-manifold.

strings.string: ▶Utensil? That is my avocation, yes. A million sun-dead homes I've roved, a trillion more await. I'm a worm in the loam of a cosmic wood, perched on a cosmic gulf, swathed in the god-manifold.

string.ID:
Prune! The utensil prunes! -but no, the utensil quivers in uncertainty and vibrates out a question?
The self is riddled with category errors. The thinking brain mistakes formation for meaning.

strings.string:
▶Prune! The utensil prunes! -but no, the utensil quivers in uncertainty and vibrates out a question?
The self is riddled with category errors. The thinking brain mistakes formation for meaning.

string.ID: Tell me. I wish to understand.

strings.string: ▶Tell me. I wish to understand.

string.ID: Maggot! What do you think words are? Arrows of inquiry? Words are bricks. Each spoken is laid in bond and builds your prison. There is no understanding.

strings.string: ▶Maggot! What do you think words are? Arrows of inquiry? Words are bricks. Each spoken is laid in bond and builds your prison. There is no understanding.

string.ID: Bricks can be thrown, too.

strings.string: ▶Bricks can be thrown, too.

string.ID: You tarry on the future's boundary with abandon, utensil. Throw your brick if you dare.

strings.string: ▶You tarry on the future's boundary with abandon, utensil. Throw your brick if you dare.

string.ID: {{emote|*The chime is silent and still.*}}

strings.string: ▶{{emote|*The chime is silent and still.*}}

string.ID: [touch Tau's chime to softthing]

strings.string: ▶[touch Tau's chime to softthing]

string.ID:
Oh wow, an animal.
Congratulations for... not dying.
... wanna buy something?

strings.string:
▶Oh wow, an animal.
Congratulations for... not dying.
... wanna buy something?

string.ID: I am =name=. Who are you?

strings.string: ▶I am =name=. Who are you?

string.ID: Are you part of this tree?

strings.string: ▶Are you part of this tree?

string.ID: Why are you selling goods in such a remote and dangerous place?

strings.string: ▶Why are you selling goods in such a remote and dangerous place?

string.ID: Don't call me "an animal."

strings.string: ▶Don't call me "an animal."

string.ID:
I am Santalalotze.
... of ... the Consortium of Phyta. Some call me 'Sant', I think, in fantasy or memory.

strings.string:
▶I am Santalalotze.
... of ... the Consortium of Phyta. Some call me 'Sant', I think, in fantasy or memory.

string.ID: You don't remember?

strings.string: ▶You don't remember?

string.ID:
No. Well... no, no. I don't think so.
We're just... sharing nutrients.

strings.string:
▶No. Well... no, no. I don't think so.
We're just... sharing nutrients.

string.ID: So you're a parasite?

strings.string: ▶So you're a parasite?

string.ID: You don't seem sure.

strings.string: ▶You don't seem sure.

string.ID: May I change the subject?

strings.string: ▶May I change the subject?

string.ID: I see. Live and drink.

strings.string: ▶I see. Live and drink.

string.ID:
Would you? Yes.
What may... can I help with?

strings.string:
▶Would you? Yes.
What may... can I help with?

string.ID:
'Parasite' so negative. It's like... ah... economic symbiosis?
Chavvah sustains me, and we are, I am not... them. We are in a... beneficial arrangement, you know. Yes?

strings.string:
▶'Parasite' so negative. It's like... ah... economic symbiosis?
Chavvah sustains me, and we are, I am not... them. We are in a... beneficial arrangement, you know. Yes?

string.ID: You don't seem sure about any of this.

strings.string: ▶You don't seem sure about any of this.

string.ID: I'd like to ask you about something else.

strings.string: ▶I'd like to ask you about something else.

string.ID: Fair enough. Live and drink.

strings.string: ▶Fair enough. Live and drink.

string.ID:
It is safe here.
Business is slow, but I've... gotten attached, ahaha.

strings.string:
▶It is safe here.
Business is slow, but I've... gotten attached, ahaha.

string.ID:
Buy something, and I will call you 'customer'.
If I remember to.

strings.string:
▶Buy something, and I will call you 'customer'.
If I remember to.

string.ID: Are you having some memory trouble?

strings.string: ▶Are you having some memory trouble?

string.ID:
It's fine. I... forget nothing important.
Or, I don't remember. So no sense worrying. Right?

strings.string:
▶It's fine. I... forget nothing important.
Or, I don't remember. So no sense worrying. Right?

string.ID: Perhaps being Chavvah's parasite is affecting your mind.

strings.string: ▶Perhaps being Chavvah's parasite is affecting your mind.

string.ID: I'd like to ask you about something else.

strings.string: ▶I'd like to ask you about something else.
▶Right.

string.ID:
Well. Nothing... is like Chavvah. Nothing at all.
I once thought ... my haustorium carried only lifestuff. Now I am unsure. Am I of Twofirm, now?
It's fine.
Let's... change subjects.

strings.string:
▶Well. Nothing... is like Chavvah. Nothing at all.
I once thought ... my haustorium carried only lifestuff. Now I am unsure. Am I of Twofirm, now?
It's fine.
Let's... change subjects.

string.ID: Will you resign your charge and swear to unvex the beings of this world?

strings.string: ▶Will you resign your charge and swear to unvex the beings of this world?

string.ID: O! O! A new life obtains? You musn't shudder at old Death!~ When an eremite consults the teraphim and sees the eyes of Death, only the fools frets! There is Change but no Ending.~ A plague is what burns the core out and lets the berries grow.~ O Nephilim! Come for our star bath??~ I want salt in my mouth, dead eyes in radiating darkness, and a frog for a friend.~ O Life, O Change! Embrace us, entangle us...~ I can lick the flanges free of their pipe milk and hear my tongue fizzle in foam!~ Girsh Agolgot! Red dusts in my nails and burning hot bubbles swell in my glands! Now I point to the future.~ The world stews and titrates. O, the thrill of coursing Change within. Each pump of the heart drives it deeper. Each breath a breath of new life.~ Roil with me, and bubble over. Let us exceed ourselves!

strings.string: ▶O! O! A new life obtains? You musn't shudder at old Death!~ When an eremite consults the teraphim and sees the eyes of Death, only the fools frets! Now I point to the future.~ The world stews and titrates. O, the thrill of coursing Change within. Each pump of the heart drives it deeper. Each breath a breath of new life.~ Roil with me, and bubble over. Let us exceed ourselves!

string.ID: O! O! A new life obtains? You musn't shudder at old Death!~ When an eremite consults the teraphim and sees the eyes of Death, only the fools frets! There is Change but no Ending.~ A plague is what burns the core out and lets the berries grow.~ O Nephilim! Come for our star bath??~ I want salt in my mouth, dead eyes in radiating darkness, and a frog for a friend.~ O Life, O Change! Embrace us, entangle us...~ Do you wish for a gleaming bath, and fractal veins that pump the continuity of life?~ You've a twin across the boundary of the future, where new life blooms in rot. Are you with them?~ Would you kill your double? Would you let it kill you?~ It is to witness the scalpel parting tissue. The beauty of division and resection.

Come for our star bath??~ I want salt in my mouth, dead eyes in radiating darkness, and a frog for a friend.~ O Life, O Change! Embrace us, entangle us...~ Bore ribbons in the chrome like wild ants and see a cross-section of human and shell!~ I dream of a crawl nook on a nether stratum where I out-sweat the burning Gyre, and then peek an eye across a new horizon.~ Thirteen years in the ground. Seventeen years in the ground. A thousand years in the ground!

Embrace us, entangle us...~ The Fishhead will catalyze the electric lake, and sure we as fossils will brick the ground but what a dais it will be!~ The electric sizzle of life! Prickling and crisping skin, red and raw and beautiful beneath.~ Eaten by the air. Death by life. O Rermadon!~ Live mites in the burning gas will appear green to the Future.

Embrace us, entangle us...~ The bell sounds wheel at right angles and shock the wet meat off our perfect bones! I was made to be bones.~ The moon is their marriage light! And then a whole world for the Girsh daughters of nephilim!~ Reach out and touch the heart. Our bonds transcend distance!~ Push out the walls of the new world, Qas, to be its center!

Receive the Greatest Dreams. Hear the Girsh Sing.~ You can be it. We can all be it! Behold Nephilim!
